tool_description: Interprets and analyzes credit bureau scores and ratings to assess supplier credit risk and reliability.

credit_score.description: Numerical credit score from credit bureau

credit_bureau.description: Credit bureau source: EXPERIAN, EQUIFAX, DUNS_BRADSTREET

payment_history.description: Payment history summary from credit report

error_messages: Invalid credit score: Credit score must be within valid range for the specified bureau.
Unsupported credit bureau: Use one of [EXPERIAN, EQUIFAX, DUNS_BRADSTREET].
Inconsistent credit data: Credit score and payment history information appear inconsistent.
usage: Provide credit_score and credit_bureau. Optionally include payment_history for enhanced interpretation. Returns credit risk assessment and recommendations.

credit_risk_level.description: Credit risk assessment: MINIMAL, LOW, MODERATE, HIGH, SEVERE

credit_grade.description: Letter grade equivalent: AAA, AA, A, BBB, BB, B, CCC, CC, C, D

credit_interpretation.description: Detailed interpretation of credit score and implications

monitoring_recommendation.description: Recommended monitoring frequency: MONTHLY, QUARTERLY, ANNUALLY
